# PHLivePhotoViewPlaybackStyle.full

**Case**

Plays back the entire motion and sound content of the Live Photo, including transition effects at the start and end.

## Declaration

```swift
case full
```

## Discussion

This style matches the effect seen when pressing on a photo in the Photos app.

## Constants

- **PHLivePhotoViewPlaybackStyle.undefined**: This value is invalid for use.
- **PHLivePhotoViewPlaybackStyle.hint**: Plays back only a brief section of the motion content of the Live Photo, without sound.
